import React from 'react' import './ProductDisplay.css' import star_icon from "../Assets/star_icon.png" import star_dull_icon from '../Assets/star_dull_icon.png' import all_product from '../Assets/all_product' const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const {product}=props; const {addToCart}=use return (

{product.name}

${product.new_price}

) } export default ProductDisplay
